text: DEADLOCK PREVENTION When a txn tries to acquire a lock that is held by another txn, the DBMS kills one of them to prevent a deadlock. This approach does not require a waits-for graph or detection algorithm. T 4' Ayl 19 55:36 / 1:18:13 -Deadlockvention > % [ec| Q Å’l ( CMU Database Systems - 17 Two-Phase Locking Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
